biotools.summary: Sigma-2 receptor selective Ligands Database is an online ligand database consisting of the Sigma-2 selective receptor ligand published since 1993. The S2RSLDB is based on structural 2D information as well as pharmacological and computed physicochemical properties and experimental procedures, retrieved from the literature.
